docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: THERE WERE A LOT of kids at our housewarming party -babies, toddlers, even one or two who were big enough to pointedly inform their parents how bored they were. The last time we moved, seven years ago, there hadn't been any. So here we are, I thought, almost 40, and really it hasn't turned out so badly for a lot of the women

byline.original: BY KATHA POLLITT; Katha Pollitt is a poet and writer who lives in New York
